Comments.Name: Mike Gold
Comments.Title: Overheating in NY
Comments.Blog: New York is experiencing a great heat wave. Dress cool!

Comments.Name: Mike G.
Comments.Title: My Productive Day
Comments.Blog: Today I went to work, read all the blogs on the internet from 8:30 - 6:00, came home and ate a salmon steak.

Comments.Name: Joe Programmer
Comments.Title: C# Corner Rocks
Comments.Blog: C# Corner has some great new changes to it. I really appreciate the ability to easily submit articles, ask questions, and look for jobs. Thanks guys for all of the hard work!!

Comments.Name: Rip Van Winkle
Comments.Title: Home Brewed Punch Card
Comments.Blog: I've run out of punch cards for my computer, so I've tried shoving pieces of cardboard in the feeder which I whittled out code with a swiss army knife, but the program seemed to result in too many bugs. Looks like I'm going to have to bite the bullet and learn COBOL.
